channel.title: Hyperion error, please help
channel.description:
[code][code=] C:\Users\Josh\Desktop\New folder (3)>Title Hyperion Rs2-Server 474
C:\Users\Josh\Desktop\New folder (3)>"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_26\bin\java .exe" -Xms512m -cp bin;lib/jython.jar;lib/slf4j-api-1.5.8.jar;lib/mina-core-2.0. 0-M6.jar;lib/slf4j-jdk14-1.5.8.jar;lib/commons-compress-1.0.jar;lib/junit-4.6.ja r org.rs2server.Server Jul 30, 2012 4:46:11 PM org.rs2server.Server main INFO: Starting Hyperion... Jul 30, 2012 4:46:11 PM org.rs2server.rs2.model.ObjectManager load INFO: Loading definitions... Jul 30, 2012 4:46:12 PM org.rs2server.rs2.model.ObjectManager load INFO: Loaded 14978 object definitions. Jul 30, 2012 4:46:12 PM org.rs2server.rs2.model.ObjectManager load INFO: Loading map... Jul 30, 2012 4:46:12 PM org.rs2server.rs2.RS2Server bind INFO: Binding to port : 43594... Jul 30, 2012 4:46:12 PM org.rs2server.rs2.ScriptManager <init> INFO: Loading scripts... Jul 30, 2012 4:46:13 PM org.rs2server.rs2.RS2Server start INFO: Waiting for pending background loading tasks... Jul 30, 2012 4:46:15 PM org.rs2server.Server main SEVERE: Error starting Hyperion. java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException: java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: com/tho ughtworks/xstream/XStream at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask$Sync.innerGet(FutureTask.java:222) at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask.get(FutureTask.java:83) at org.rs2server.util.BlockingExecutorService.waitForPendingTasks(Blocki ngExecutorService.java:50) at org.rs2server.rs2.RS2Server.start(RS2Server.java:84) at org.rs2server.Server.main(Server.java:37) Caused by: java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: com/thoughtworks/xstream/XStream at org.rs2server.util.XMLController.<clinit>(XMLController.java:38) at org.rs2server.rs2.model.ObjectManager.load(ObjectManager.java:61) at org.rs2server.rs2.model.World$1.call(World.java:156) at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask$Sync.innerRun(FutureTask.java:303) at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask.run(FutureTask.java:138) at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.runTask(ThreadPoolExec utor.java:886) at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.run(ThreadPoolExecutor .java:908) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:662) Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: com.thoughtworks.xstream.XStream at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(URLClassLoader.java:202) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(URLClassLoader.java:190) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:306) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Launcher.java:301) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:247) ... 8 more Jul 30, 2012 4:46:15 PM org.rs2server.rs2.model.boundary.BoundaryManager init INFO: Loading boundary definitions... Jul 30, 2012 4:46:15 PM org.rs2server.rs2.model.ItemDefinition init INFO: Loading item definitions... Jul 30, 2012 4:46:15 PM org.rs2server.rs2.model.ItemDefinition init INFO: Loaded 14000 item definitions. Jul 30, 2012 4:46:15 PM org.rs2server.rs2.model.NPCDefinition init INFO: Loading NPC definitions... Jul 30, 2012 4:46:15 PM org.rs2server.rs2.model.NPCDefinition init INFO: Loaded 6391 NPC definitions. Jul 30, 2012 4:46:15 PM org.rs2server.rs2.model.CombatNPCDefinition init INFO: Loading combat NPC definitions... Jul 30, 2012 4:46:15 PM org.rs2server.rs2.model.equipment.EquipmentDefinition in it INFO: Loading equipment definitions... Jul 30, 2012 4:46:15 PM org.rs2server.rs2.model.Shop init INFO: Loading Shops definitions... Jul 30, 2012 4:46:15 PM org.rs2server.rs2.model.ItemSpawn init INFO: Loading item spawns... Jul 30, 2012 4:46:15 PM org.rs2server.rs2.model.minigame.impl.FightPits <init> INFO: Fight Pits minigame started.[/code]

item.title: Hyperion error, please help
item.dc:creator: @shank_beast shank beast
item.description:
@shank_beast wrote:

not sure how to fix

Read full topic

item.title: Hyperion error, please help
item.dc:creator: @the_soul The Soul
item.description:
@the_soul wrote:

shank beast:

so i needa make a xstream class?

You probably already have it, the VM just can’t find it where it was supposed to be during runtime.

Read full topic
